H0.text: Replacing wood doors with aluminum doors could help reduce a home heating bill in winter.

H1.text: Using more insulation in the walls of the home could help reduce a home heating bill in winter.

H2.text: Removing thick rugs and heavy curtains in the home could help reduce a home heating bill in winter.

H3.text: Painting the roof of the home white to reflect light could help to reduce a home heating bill in winter.

A4.text: Building insulation, thermal insulation added to buildings for comfort and energy efficiency
